short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that allows you to send messages in bulk via WhatsApp™ Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recruiters who reach out to candidates over WhatsApp - This tool will change your life forever. 

With WA fast recruit you can reach out to 100's of candidates in a single click. 

⚙️ Here's how it works :
1️⃣ Upload candidate details
2️⃣ Type the message you want to share
3️⃣ Click on send
AND Voila !

Save your time - identify who to call first and have a conversation with only relevant candidates 


WhatsApp Fast Recruit helps you:
👉 Easily send job details
👉 Collect candidate CV’s and documents 
👉 Share walk-in interview details 
👉 Request callbacks from candidates


🚀Features
● Send personalised message
● Send attachments like images, video and PDF’s
● Send bulk WhatsApp message from excel or by number copy paste
● Save your own WhatsApp message template
● Track current sending progress
● Pause and resume campaigns at any time
● Export sending result list


Try the safest WhatsApp sender, send bulk messages on WhatsApp and speed up your hiring process!

If you like WA Bulk Message Sender, show us more love with a nice review. It really helps.


Best Practices:
● Do not message from your personal number and use a professional number for messaging and contacting your users 
● Do not send messages from a brand new number, use a number that is at least 3 months old and has been actively used on WhatsApp  
● This software is not to be used against policies of WhatsApp™ Inc in any manner like spamming users
 


WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. WA fast Recruit is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
